app.title: Store Preview
joyride.content.search: You can search for products here
joyride.content.addToCart: Click here to add items to your shopping list
joyride.content.cart: Click here to view your shopping list. You can check the value of items you intend to purchase and take a screenshot to send to the seller
ccuPlanner.title: CCU Planner
ccuPlanner.heading: Ship Upgrade Planner
ccuPlanner.error.lowerToHigher: CCU can only upgrade from lower priced ships to higher priced ships
ccuPlanner.error.pathExists: A path already exists from source ship to target ship, duplicate connection not created
pathBuilder.title: Path Builder
ccuPlanner.instructions: Drag ships from the left panel to get started, then connect them to create an upgrade path
newsModal.title: Hello
newsModal.welcome: Welcome to Star Citizen Ship Upgrade Planner
newsModal.developmentStage: This tool is still in development and the data for this tool is manually collected.
newsModal.dataSource: If you find any bugs or mistakes, please feel free to contact me
newsModal.pleaseDownloadNewExtension: Since the original extension did not include the new domain, please download the extension again
extensionModal.title: Install Extension Instructions
extensionModal.description: Since the extension is not yet on the Chrome Store, it needs to be installed manually:
extensionModal.step1: Download and extract the extension files
extensionModal.step2: Open Chrome browser and enter chrome://extensions/ in the address bar
extensionModal.step3: Enable "Developer mode" in the top right corner
extensionModal.step5: Select the folder you just extracted
extensionModal.step6: After installation, refresh this page to use the extension
extensionModal.note: Note: The extension is only used to read upgrade information from your RSI account and does not collect any personal data.
routeInfoPanel.title: Alternative Upgrade Routes
routeInfoPanel.conciergeTooltip: Fill in how many dollars it costs you to get $1 of concierge value. If you don't care about concierge value, enter 0. The actual cost of upgrading is calculated as dollars spent + RMB spent * exchange rate * (1 + concierge conversion ratio)
routeInfoPanel.routesTooltip: The upgrade paths have been pruned to ensure calculations can be completed in a reasonable time. Only the first path is guaranteed to be optimal, not all possible alternatives are guaranteed to be shown
navigate.title: Star Citizen Tools
navigate.subtitle: Useful tools for Star Citizen players
navigate.upgradeDesc: Create your CCU upgrade path, plan the optimal upgrade strategy
navigate.storeDesc: Browse all items in the Star Citizen store
navigate.changelogDesc: View the latest changes and updates to the application
changelogs.title: Changelog
changelogs.heading: Changelog
routeInfoPanel.pruneOptTooltip: If checked, the upgrade paths have been pruned to ensure calculations can be completed in a reasonable time. Only the first path is guaranteed to be optimal, not all possible alternatives are guaranteed to be shown
ccuPlanner.showHistoryWBTooltip: This is a test function, the data may not be accurate
pathBuilder.step3: Select all ships that need to be included to the path
ccuPlanner.error.targetShipPriceZero: This ship can only be upgraded using a hangar CCU
pathBuilder.noCcus: No CCU was found in your hangar
pathBuilder.step2Ccu: Select CCUs you want to use

ccuPlanner.seoDescription: Star Citizen CCU Upgrade Planner - Help you plan and optimize ship upgrade paths
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
hangar.title: Hangar
appSettings.title: App Settings
settings.preferencesDescription: Manage your preferences and settings here.
settings.currencyDescription: The currency you prefer to use when setting up a link using third-party CCUs.
settings.clearAllDataDescription: Clear all local data, including all user data and settings. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clearUserDataDescription: Clear the hangar data of a specific user. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmClearAllDescription: This action will clear all local storage data, including user information, settings, and preferences. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmClearUserDescription: This action will clear all local storage data of the selected user. This action cannot be undone.
